trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around November 11th 2007
Summary: UFO Sightings Off Coast of Broward County
divs: sighting detailsa friend of mine and i were at ft lauderdale beach, looking out onto the ocean and around 210 pm noticed two metallic orbs about 25 miles off shore, 1\2 to 1 inch above the horizon. there were no boats around them. no apparent tethers. no contrails, smoke, etc, things associated with propulsion aircraft. the object to the south hovered in the same spot. around 225 pm, the object, went down directly into the atlantic. the object to the north continued to hover until 3 pm, when we left the beach. i have seen a similar sighting, in a different part of the world, where the object went down directly into the water.
